title: Sprinklr | SSE | India
content:
Education: BTech Tier 1 (IIT/NIT)
YOE: 3.5+ years
Prior Experience: Fintech Startup
Previous CTC: 37 LPA + 25L ESOPs (vested over 4 years)
WLB: Extremely poor (No personal life)

**Offer:**
Company: Sprinklr
Title/Level: SSE
Location: India

Salary: 44L
Relocation/Signing Bonus: NA
Stock bonus: NA
Bonus: Performance: NA

Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 44L

Benefits: https://sprinklrbenefits.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/2025-IND-Guide-Dec-29-2024.pdf

Am I getting lowballed here?
How is the WLB and overall culture at Sprinklr after the recent leadership changes? I was told throughout the interviews that WLB has significantly improved since the new leadership changes (from CTO to Associate Directors all have joined from Adobe). How true is this?

title: Booking Holdings | SE2 | Bangalore
content:
Education: B Tech. in CSE ( Tier 3 College )
Years of Experience: 5+
Prior Experience: Product Based MNC (Fintech) with TC 42 (33 Base)
Date of the Offer: 17th Feb 2025
Company: Booking Holdings
Title/Level: SE 2
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 46,00,000 INR
Relocation/Signing Bonus: 0L
Stock bonus: $20,000 RSUs vested over 3 years
Bonus: 15%
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 58.7L for first year
Benefits: Standard (Free Cab , Free Food, Travel Reimbursement)
Other details:
